JK Tyre & Industries Ltd. is a prominent Indian tyre manufacturer with a strong global presence. Founded in 1951 and operational since 1974, the company is part of the JK Group and operates 12 manufacturing plants worldwide, including in India and Mexico. It produces over 30 million tyres annually and is known for its technological advancements, including being the first in India to manufacture radial tyres for commercial vehicles.

The company offers a wide range of products for various vehicle segments, including passenger vehicles, commercial vehicles, two-wheelers, and specialty tyres like the Smart Tyres, which feature embedded sensors for real-time monitoring. JK Tyre also provides retreading services to extend tyre life. With flagship brands such as JK Tyre, Vikrant, and Dunlop, the company serves both domestic and international markets, exporting to over 100 countries. Committed to sustainability, JK Tyre focuses on eco-friendly initiatives and innovative solutions in tyre manufacturing.

TBC Ltd is recognized as a leading supplier, contributing significantly to the global tyre industry.

Short Description:
Tyre Stewardship Australia (TSA) is a national organization founded in 2014 to implement Australia’s National Tyre Product Stewardship Scheme. TSA focuses on sustainable management of end-of-life tyres by collaborating with over 1,700 accredited participants, including tyre retailers, recyclers, manufacturers, fleet operators, and local councils. The organization aims to minimize waste and promote circular economy solutions for tyres.

TSA operates throughout the tyre recovery supply chain, emphasizing market development for recycled tyre products, conducting research to advance recycling technologies, and partnering with mining companies to tackle sustainability challenges related to off-the-road tyres. TSA also supports the commercialization of tyre-derived materials through funding initiatives and showcases successful projects that repurpose tyres into various applications. The organization has achieved ISO certification and carbon-neutral status, reflecting its commitment to sustainability and environmental responsibility.

Micheldever Tyre Services is a private limited company and part of the Micheldever Group, the largest tyre wholesaler in the UK. Established in 1972, the company is headquartered in Micheldever Station, Winchester, Hampshire. It was incorporated on May 18, 1984, and operates a nationwide network of independent fast fit and mechanical services.

The company specializes in the wholesale and retail trade of motor vehicle parts and accessories, with a strong focus on tyres. Micheldever Tyre Services supplies a variety of well-known tyre brands, including Michelin, Pirelli, Continental, Bridgestone, and Dunlop. In addition to tyre supply, it likely offers mechanical services through its extensive network of fast fit centers, catering to both individual vehicle owners and commercial fleets across the UK.

The company operates from its base in Frankfurt am Main, Germany, and is dedicated to providing business solutions and customer support across Europe. Sailun has modern manufacturing facilities in China and Vietnam, producing a diverse range of tires.

The product lineup includes passenger car tires, truck and bus radial tires, off-the-road tires for heavy machinery, and specialty tires for agricultural and industrial applications. Originally named Christie and Brown Limited, the company rebranded to its current name in 1988. It is recognized as Surrey's leading independent tyre specialist, focusing on the wholesale trade of motor vehicle parts and accessories, particularly tyres.

Guildford Tyre Company Ltd. prides itself on understanding customer needs and providing personalized service, reflecting its family-owned and operated ethos. Short Description:
The Tyre Collective is a clean-tech start-up based in London, founded in 2020. The company focuses on reducing the environmental impact of tyre wear, which contributes significantly to microplastic pollution and air quality issues. Their mission is to promote zero-emission mobility through innovative solutions that capture and monitor tyre wear.

The Tyre Collective has developed a patent-pending device that captures tyre wear particles using electrostatics and airflow. This technology can be retrofitted to existing vehicles and is also planned for integration into new electric vehicles. The captured particles can be upcycled into products like bitumen and shoe soles, creating a closed-loop system. Additionally, their technology connects to a cloud platform for real-time monitoring, helping fleet operators and manufacturers optimize tyre wear capture and comply with environmental regulations.

The company is a Certified B Corporation, reflecting its commitment to social and environmental responsibility. It has also received recognition through the James Dyson Award for its innovative approach to tackling tyre wear pollution.

Tiger Wheel & Tyre provides a wide range of premium tyres, alloy wheels, reliable automotive batteries, and various accessories to enhance vehicle performance. Owned by the Sven Tyréns Trust, the company emphasizes long-term projects and invests significantly in research and development. With a workforce of over 3,000 employees, Tyréns operates in several countries, including Sweden, Denmark, England, Estonia, Lithuania, Poland, and Bulgaria.

The company offers a wide range of consulting services, including structural planning and design, innovative infrastructure solutions, IT services tailored to urban development, and property development and management consulting. Short Description:
Triangle Tyre, founded in 1976 in Shandong Province, China, has grown into a prominent global tire manufacturer. Initially supplying small tires for street-sweepers and rubbish carts, the company now offers over 900 types of radial tires across more than 280 sizes. Their product range includes tires for passenger cars, SUVs, light trucks, buses, and off-the-road vehicles, as well as specialized tires for civil aviation.

The company has a strong presence in the domestic market and is expanding internationally, operating in over 160 countries. In 2017, Triangle Tyre opened its first international manufacturing plant in Tennessee, USA. With a production capacity exceeding 30 million tires annually and a workforce of around 25,000, Triangle Tyre reported a revenue of approximately RMB 25.62 billion in 2022. The company prioritizes research and development, collaborating with institutions to innovate and enhance its tire technology.

Rubber King Tyre Private Limited is a tyre manufacturing company based in Gujarat, India, and a subsidiary of the Gawarvala Group. Established in 1981, it operates four advanced manufacturing plants in Gujarat and has a global presence through its Dubai-based trading unit, G8 International, which was set up in 2006. The company specializes in industrial and automotive tyre solutions, offering a range of products that include solid tyres, pneumatic tyres, and various accessories.

The product lineup features industrial solutions like the Sultan, Jwala, and Vesper tyres for forklifts, as well as specialized tyres such as Agrim for agriculture and Solitrek for port trailers. Rubber King Tyre is committed to quality and sustainability, holding certifications like IATF, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001. The company focuses on eco-friendly manufacturing practices and serves clients in the industrial, agricultural, and port logistics sectors across North India, supported by a nationwide sales and service network.

Özka Tyre, founded in 1991, is a prominent manufacturer of agricultural and industrial tires based in Kocaeli, Turkey. As a subsidiary of the Kanık Group, the company employs around 1,200 people and adheres to international standards, holding certifications such as ISO 9001 and ISO 14001. Özka has been recognized as Turkey’s export champion, achieving significant export figures and a total turnover of 573 million TL in 2018.

The company specializes in a wide range of durable tires, including agricultural tires like tractor and harvester tires, as well as industrial tires for forklifts and heavy construction equipment. Özka produces approximately 1.5 million units annually and has a strong focus on customer satisfaction through its Technical Services Team, which offers global support. With a commitment to sustainability, Özka also engages in scrap tire recycling. The company serves over 80 countries, targeting key markets in Europe, the Middle East, and the U.S., and collaborates with numerous dealers and distributors for its products.

The company specializes in manufacturing a diverse range of tyres for two-wheelers, three-wheelers, scooters, motorcycles, and commercial vehicles such as trucks and buses. Birla Tyres is known for its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, receiving accreditation from international organizations like DNV Business Assurance.

The company has a strong global presence, exporting its products to over 50 countries, including Bangladesh, Vietnam, and various regions in Africa, Asia, and South America. Birla Tyres collaborates with Pirelli to enhance its product offerings, particularly in radial tyres, and operates a modern plant in Balasore, Odisha. With a network of over 3,500 dealers and a dedicated sales team, Birla Tyres continues to expand its market reach and serve original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) effectively.

Rubber King Tyre Group, based in Ahmedabad, India, is a prominent manufacturer and exporter of automotive components, specializing in quality flaps and butyl inner tubes. Founded in 1981, the company has grown significantly and is recognized as a key player in the Indian tyre manufacturing sector. It established its first flap plant in 1982 and expanded its production capabilities with a tube plant in 1993.

The company produces a variety of products, including butyl inner tubes for different tyre applications, automotive flaps, and tyre curing bladders. Rubber King exports its products to over 70 countries and has been acknowledged as a successful "Export House" by the Ministry of Commerce for eight consecutive years. The company is committed to quality, holding several certifications such as ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001, and employs improvement tools like Six Sigma and Kaizen to maintain high standards. Led by founder Dinesh Gawarvala, Rubber King prioritizes customer satisfaction, workplace safety, and community engagement.

Commercial Tyre Business (CTB) is a UK-based industry journal that has been a key resource for the truck and agricultural tyre sector for over 13 years. It serves as a media and information platform for commercial tyre professionals, providing insights into market trends, manufacturing updates, and technological advancements.

CTB offers industry news coverage, market analysis, and multimedia content, including interviews with industry leaders and video briefings. Its specialized content is available in both print and digital formats, focusing on the commercial tyre markets. The publication covers significant developments in the tyre industry and provides expert insights that benefit tyre manufacturers, fleet operators, telematics providers, distributors, and retailers.

With a niche focus on truck and agricultural tyres, CTB has a global reach, covering international developments and integrating multimedia elements into its journalism. It plays a vital role in connecting various stakeholders within the commercial tyre industry through targeted reporting and analysis.

Falken Tyre Europe GmbH is the European branch of Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd., one of the largest tyre manufacturers globally. Based in Offenbach am Main, Germany, the company manages the marketing and distribution of a wide variety of tyres throughout Europe. Falken is a key supplier of original equipment tyres for many leading car brands and also caters to the aftermarket sector.

The company offers tyres for various vehicle types, including passenger cars, light trucks, medium trucks, SUVs, and pick-up trucks. Falken's products are developed through rigorous testing, including participation in motorsport events, which helps enhance their tyre technology for improved performance and driving enjoyment. Falken Tyre Europe adheres to high-quality standards, holding certifications such as ISO 9001, ISO/TS 16949, and ISO 14001, reflecting its commitment to quality and environmental responsibility.

Ghandhara Tyre and Rubber Company Limited, established in 1963, is one of Pakistan's largest automotive tyre manufacturers. Headquartered in Karachi, the company was formerly known as The General Tyre and Rubber Company of Pakistan Limited until its name change in December 2021. 

The company specializes in manufacturing and trading a wide range of tyres, including those for passenger cars, SUVs, light trucks, and motorcycles. It also provides wheel alignment and balancing services. Ghandhara Tyre serves various markets, including original equipment manufacturers, the replacement market through a network of over 165 authorized dealers, government institutions, and international export markets. 

Ghandhara Tyre is owned by Bibojee Services (Private) Limited and Pakistan Kuwait Investment Company (Private) Limited, with technical support from Continental AG, which has been a partner since acquiring General Tire International Corporation in 1987.

GTR Tyre, also known as Ghandhara Tyre & Rubber Company Limited, is Pakistan’s first and largest automotive tyre manufacturer, established in 1963. Headquartered in Landhi, Karachi, the company began production in 1964 and has grown to a capacity of 4.1 million tyres annually. GTR specializes in steel-belted tubeless radial tyres for a variety of vehicles, including cars, SUVs, trucks, and buses, and serves as a primary tyre supplier for major Pakistani automakers.

The company has a strong commitment to quality, holding certifications such as ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001. GTR has also rebranded to emphasize safety, durability, and innovation in its products. It operates a dealer network across Pakistan and offers tyre-care consultancy, including training programs for drivers and service teams. With over 60 years of experience, GTR focuses on producing tyres that meet international quality standards while being optimized for local road conditions.

MAXXIS Tyre Bangladesh, officially known as Maxxis Bangladesh Co. Ltd., is a prominent tire importer and distributor in Bangladesh with over 20 years of experience. The company is part of Maxxis International, which has a global reputation for quality and performance in tire manufacturing, established over 50 years ago.

The company specializes in a wide range of tires, particularly passenger car radial tires, and is recognized as a leader in this segment within the Bangladeshi market. MAXXIS Tyre Bangladesh emphasizes high-quality products and exceptional customer service, aiming to build lasting relationships with its clients. The company serves a diverse customer base, including individual vehicle owners and commercial fleets, reflecting its strong market presence.

Tyre News Media is a UK-based digital news platform dedicated to the tyre industry. It provides comprehensive coverage, including timely updates, insights, and analysis for professionals such as manufacturers, distributors, retailers, and fleet managers. The platform is independent and editorially driven, focusing on fostering community engagement and sparking conversations within the sector.

The company offers a range of services, including news reporting on industry trends, technological advancements, and sustainability initiatives. It also facilitates dialogue among industry professionals through digital content. Additionally, Tyre News Media provides tailored advertising solutions, allowing brands to connect with decision-makers in the tyre market. With a significant portion of its audience holding leadership roles, the platform effectively reaches a B2B audience, primarily composed of industry professionals.

Short Description:
Tyre Doctor is a reputable company in the automotive service and collision repair industry, focusing on mining and earthmoving tyres and wheels. Founded in 1986 by Sel Hester, the company began by offering hot vulcanised tyre repair services for the agricultural sector and has since expanded its reach across Queensland and New South Wales, Australia.

The company provides a variety of services, including tyre repair, tyre fitting, and tyre management. These services are tailored to support large industrial projects, particularly in the mining sector, where safety and reliability are crucial. Tyre Doctor is committed to delivering high-quality tyres and wheels designed to meet the rigorous demands of mining and earthmoving applications. With over 30 years of experience, Tyre Doctor has established itself as a trusted partner for major companies in these industries.

Short Description:
Michelin Aircraft Tyre is a division of the Michelin Group, specializing in aircraft tires and related products. With over 50 years of experience in the aviation industry, the company is recognized for its commitment to innovation and sustainability. Michelin Aircraft offers a wide range of products, including radial and bias tires, tubes, and the Michelin Air X Sky Light tire, which is designed to be lighter and longer-lasting.

The company serves a diverse clientele, including major aircraft manufacturers like Boeing and Airbus, as well as prominent airlines such as Air France and Emirates. Michelin Aircraft caters to various aviation sectors, including commercial, regional, general aviation, and military aviation. Their focus on developing environmentally friendly products while maintaining high safety standards underscores their dedication to sustainability and performance in the aviation industry.

Tyre Response Group (TRG) is an independent provider of Off-The-Road (OTR) tyre management and maintenance services based in Perth, Western Australia. With over 100 years of combined industry experience in its leadership team, TRG focuses on safety, performance, and cost-effective solutions for the mining, construction, and heavy machinery sectors.

TRG offers a range of services, including OTR tyre training, consulting for procurement strategies, and contract labour for tyre fitting teams. They specialize in tyre lifecycle management, ensuring the selection, maintenance, and optimization of third-party OTR tyres to maximize value and longevity. The company operates primarily in Western Australia, particularly in resource-rich areas like Kalgoorlie-Boulder, and is committed to delivering best-in-class tyre management while fostering a positive workplace culture and emphasizing environmental responsibility.

Short Description:
Prometeon Tyre Group is a global tire manufacturer that specializes in producing and selling tires for various industries, including transportation, agriculture, and off-the-road applications. Established in 2017 as a spin-off from Pirelli Tyre, the company initially focused on Pirelli-branded tires and has since expanded its offerings.

With a presence in over 15 countries and operations across five continents, Prometeon engages with diverse cultures and fosters an inclusive work environment. The company is dedicated to excellence and innovation, promoting teamwork and ethical leadership among its employees. Its product range includes truck tires for heavy-duty transport, bus tires for passenger safety, AGRO tires for agricultural use, and OTR tires for rugged environments like construction and mining.

Prometeon emphasizes customer satisfaction and leverages its technological expertise to develop high-quality products. The company is also committed to sustainability, focusing on improving environmental impact and product performance through innovation.
